resources.string: New user? Click to create your account!

string-array.name: v60_method
string-array.item: Pour 50.00g of water until all the grounds are evenly saturated
Wait for the coffee to bloom
Pour another 50.00g of water in spiral rotation
Wait for the water to drain through the grounds
Pour the remaining 120.00g of water around the edges of the dripper
Let the water drain through and when it\'s done discard the filter and server
